Lo mejor :'3 <3 Me encanta este juego y con amigos es super divertido :'3 <3 <3 <3 Mucho amor para este juego :3 <3 

Editado: Sigue siendo lo mejor :D

Sucesor de Portal 1, esta segunda entrega extiende y potencia la historia y la jugabilidad de la primera. 
Es un juego espectacular. ¿Se puede contrastar contra la primera entrega? Sí, Portal 1 fue más sencillo y más corto. En Portal 2, se alterna los rompecabezas (bien llamados en este juego) con la historia, por lo que a veces se frena un poco, y otras veces se siente que el juego se estira sin sentido. 
Pero es un juego genial, totalmente recomendable para todo aquel que quiere golpearse la cabeza contra el teclado.

솔직히 스팀 계정을 만들고 꼭 해봐야 하는 게임중 하나.
안하면 후회할지도 모를정도.
Yeah, portal is amazing

玩了那么多年的传送门，终于有机会来谈谈对这款游戏的体验了。
对于这款游戏，我最想表达的就是这款游戏的创新理念。看似非常的一把传送门枪，却能够创造出无限的可能。
玩家必须思考问题，逻辑性强才能通关。
二代相比一代场景更宏大，谜题更复杂。二代的传送门枪弹道比一代更快，一代中先开枪再进门的技巧在二代就不适用了。
相当于减少了一个可以利用的小技巧，变相增加了难度。
通关后的小GlaDOS演唱加上炮塔合奏可称为天籁之音。
在游戏后期介绍了光圈科技的历史，介绍了GLaDOS的由来。
其中通过广播可知白色凝胶来源是月岩，这为也本作的神结尾埋下伏笔。
通关后站在一望无际的麦田前，让人感到思绪万千，带着对GlaDOS的不舍，最后陪伴自己的伙伴只有1代里的爱心方块。
游戏性能：10/10    超级低的配置需求，大部分的电脑都可以流畅运行。
游戏难度：  8/10    或许认为自己逻辑思维非常强，整体难度不难。[spoiler] 当然说的是官方流程，创意工坊的高难度简直反人类[/spoiler]
游戏感受：  9/10    有单人图和双人地图，联机欢乐多，增加 羁绊和默契的好地方。[spoiler] 首先你要有个女朋友来联机，实在没有找个基友也凑合（会心一击！）[/spoiler]
推荐程度： 10/10  价格实惠（多次打折），可以独乐乐或者二人转的游戏还不赶紧买买买！！
[spoiler] 这么多年一直没有出续作！G胖来和我一起念：斯~  安~ 三~  [/spoiler]

Ставлю этой игре 10 атлосов и 10.

С игрой все понятно, она классная. Вместо моих нудных слов читайте стих Пастернака: О, знал бы я, что так бывает,
Когда пускался на дебют,
Что строчки с кровью - убивают,
Нахлынут горлом и убьют!

От шуток с этой подоплекой
Я б отказался наотрез.
Начало было так далеко,
Так робок первый интерес.

Но старость - это Рим, который
Взамен турусов и колес
Не читки требует с актера,
А полной гибели всерьез.

Когда строку диктует чувство,
Оно на сцену шлет раба,
И тут кончается искусство,
И дышат почва и судьба.

W pierwszym przezemnie wymienionym trybie gra się niezłą duperą . Natomiast w tym drugim już nie jest tak kolorowo , gra się tam robotami które wyglądają jak nowe podpaski . 坚持不看攻略，然后喜闻乐见卡关3个月后，某天播放器里偶然推给我GLados在传送门1里唱的那首那首'Still Alive'时，感觉被深深嘲讽了一般，遂下定决心一定要在2里推到这个叫做GLados的傲娇萌妹，然而最后她却只给我留下一句'Want you gone'就把我狠狠甩了...这时我才发现自己扮演的chell也是个女孩 ...

关于游戏的评测并不用多说了，只是想说这游戏卡关跟智商没啥关系（[strike] 赶紧给自己洗洗[/strike]），关键是抗3d眩晕和空间想象力。我原本以为我对FPS类已经疲倦了，玩了传送门以后才知道自己只是单纯不喜欢突突突而已。

Portal Life 3: the half life cross over        COMFIRMED!!!    


 (its set in the same world as halflife to explain the strang connections between the games lol)

An absolutely amazing game. You're doing yourself a disservice if you have not played this one. I'm ashamed to say I've had this in my library for years and have only just got round to it. Why???!

Valve set a high bar with the first Portal game ( which I played immediately before this) but they've managed to surpass it in pretty much every way. 

First up, I'm amazed by the creativity of the level design. How do these guys come up with this stuff? The levels are delightful, and with the exception of one level it was not necessary to go online for help. Regarding the core single player game and speaking as a fairly average gamer, I'd say they've pitched the difficulty nigh-on perfect. It might be the best puzzle games I've ever played. That said, I haven't got to the advanced maps. Based on my experience of the first game, these are going to be taxing, but in the most enjoyable way!

If the outstanding core puzzle game wasn't enough, Valve have managed to wrap this package around a brilliantly told  roller coaster story which keeps you wanting to play to see what happens next.  GladOS is as charismatic as ever, and the new character Wheatley is a welcome new addition to the Portal universe. 

On the merits of the single player game I'[m recommending as I've yet to play co-op. Everything I've seen suggests that might be even more fun than the single player.

Summary: an amazing game that is of the calbre of Half Life 2.. Valve really do know how to make a good game. 

Oh, and speaking of Half Life....but you already know what I'm going to say?

The story of the Portal Series has been as compelling as it has been mysterious and Portal 2 strongly represents these attributes. The gameplay was fun and challenging while the characters were likeable and humorous. 10/10

My favourite game of all time, let me tell you why:

[spoiler] It's a Portal game. [/spoiler] Yeah, yeah. I know i went too much into the details.




But no, seriously. Why are you even looking at the reviews? IF you're having a hard time deciding(is that even possible?!) then just look at all the other reviews. Judging by the fact that you came here in the first place, you WILL end up with this game in your steam library sooner or later.

Замечательная игра!Как всегда у Вентелей лучшая в жанре,а для меня так и вообще среди всех игр...Одиночная кампания шедевральна,но и кооп тоже шикарный!Всем советую!Жалко что Толстячек Ньюэл перестал радовать нас шедеврами...ну в принципе-если деньги капают,зачем работать?Я б тож наверное не стал бы...хотя..кто знает-может хотя бы ради искусства=)и хоть сюжет логически завершен,все равно,вопреки здравому смыслу хочется продолжения...

Единственный даже не минус,а скорее придирка-в первой части была получше песня...по крайней мере для меня))а эта как то не запомнилась....и еще минус-когда заканчиваешь играть становиться грустно...потому что игра закончиласьxD

Замечательная игра,и не бойтесь жанра головоломки(а то мне встречались и такие люди,которые нелестно отзывались об игре только потому что это головоломка!При это даже ни разу не играли в нее!!)-в игре нет не решаемых прям мозгодробительных головоломок-но мозг включить придется=)и головоломки можно проходить множеством способов...и сюжет замечательный и юмор(немного черный)отменный,в общем ШЕДЕВР!!!Жаль что нельзя стереть память и пройти еще раз...и что другой такой же шедевральной игры больше не встретишь..


ЕСЛИ НЕ ИГРАЛИ-ПРОХОЖДЕНИЕ ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНО,а не то МНОГО пропустите=)

Divertente, cervellotico e abbastanza difficile; più lungo e più impegnativo del primo capitolo, ruota attorno ad un trama strettamente collegata alle vicende accadute nel suo predecessore. Ricco di gag intelligenti e mai dozzinali, vale tutti i soldi che spenderete per acquistarlo.

[b][u]WARNING: THIS LIST MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS - YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED![/u][/b]

[h1]Pros:[/h1]

1. Much longer story than the original game

2. Top quality voice actors

3. Top quality credits song, but it's not on the same level as Still Alive

4. Well-implemented mechanics

5. More than just story mode

6. Full challenge mode

7. Full level editor

8. Active workshop community

[h1]Cons:[/h1]

1. Slightly rage-enducing

2. You get [spoiler]smack-talked by Wheatley in the last few chapters[/spoiler]

3. Challenge mode leaderboards are full of cheaters

4. Workshop is not too dissimilar to Greenlight, in the sense that it is loaded with terrible maps

5. Somewhat confusing new mechanics for new players

6. Somewhat dissappointing Co-operative Testing Initiative, [spoiler]referenced in the story[/spoiler]

[h1]Final rating: 8.6/10[/h1]

This game is nice. You have to think and use logic to play. Some levels at ending were hard to me, but why should be game easy right :) ? Anyway, thanks for this game. Ending was funny and confusing too :)

Jedná se o další díl hry Portal

+++Obsahuje CooP mod můžete hrát s kamarádem nebo s nějakým náhodným člověkem kterého vám to přiřadí v lobby
+++Zároveň si můžete zahrát sami
+Velmi zapeklitá hra na myšlení :D některé levely vám můžou zabrat i několik desítek minut
+Hra obsahuje "Sběratelské kartičky služby steam" za které si můžete potom vytvořit krásný odznak brambory :D
+v Coop modu hrajete za roboty ale v single hrajete za člověka
+Psihycky narušený počítač dodává hře pravou atmosféru


-+-Této hře nemám co vytknout možná by mě něco napadlo ale momentálně ne :(

Super hra ve které "Aperture laboratories" zkouší chytrost robotů :D

I loved this game! its enjoyable even after playing through the campaign mode 6 times And also, is there a limit to the workshop?

Pros: 
-Exellent graphics
-Great story
-Wheatley(I fricken love him)
-Co-op mode is awesome(see the end cutscene for co-op mode after course 6)
-Workshop is expansive

Cons:
~Has a loading screen after EVERY chamber(i hate waiting [:(} )
~Does not like old computers
~GLaDOS is mean
~Most of the workshop levels are beyond my brainpower
~TURRETS ARE EVERYWHERE,MAN
 
Overall, I say it's a great game. Me and my friends enjoy playing it(along with Minecraft, which i also recommend).I hope yuo and ur friens enjoy playing as much a me and mine do! getthegamegetthegamegetthegamegetthegame.

Portal 2 est un jeux juste génial a joué on y trouve beaucoup de chose qui font que le jeux marque les esprits : de la difficulté sur les enigme (qui peuvent faire rager qu'on on n'est pas logique ^^), un coop bien foutu pour jouer entre ami, un amour bien chercher et la cummunauté qui crée des salle de test pour augmenter les heure de jeux.
Malgré un solo un peu court mais avec un bon dosage de difficulté et sont coop très fun a faire entre pote il vaut son prix croyez moi ^^

Best I've ever played :)

I think Portal 1 was better because it was a little more challenging, but Portal 2 probaly has a better flow due to how much easier it is. I put more hours into this game on another account, so this is my second time buying it. If you like P1, you'll like P2 and the new elements they implemented. 

The co-op is fun assuming your partner isn't trying to take the harder approach that wasn't intended to be taken. The game also follows the idea that if you're stuck you're probably overthinking it.

Anyways, buy it, it's fun.
Aussi bien que le 1er :)

De los mejores juegos que he probado en mi vida. Aquí viene una pequeña anécdota... Para que os hagáis una idea, me descargué el juego, me lo jugué, me gustó tanto que me lo volví a pasar, y me gusto TANTO que finalmente me lo acabé comprando y me lo volví a pasar (de hecho, fue de los primeritos juegos que me pillé nada más hacerme Steam).

Historia sublime, banda sonora memorable, los personajes principales son entrañables, el gameplay del Portal 1 parecía que no se podía superar, pero lo hicieron todavía mejor... Y a eso le añadimos modo cooperativo y chorrocientos mapas que podemos jugar creados por la comunidad, algunos tan buenos que parecen casi del propio juego.

Brutal, la nota que tiene se lo merece. No me considero fan de Half-Life, pero Portal 2 acaba de confirmar que Valve es capaz de convertir un videojuego en arte. 9'5/10

All I can say is that this game has to be one of the best games of all time.

VALVe never ceases to release good content. However, saying this game is good is an understatement. This game revolutionized the gaming industry, and you get sucked into the lore and immense story immediately. The first game was amazing, but this just blew it away.

  I can honestly say almost everybody wants a Portal 3. Whether it be Chell again, or a new character, we need a new Portal game. Why do we need a new Portal game? The last two were so amazing that we need a new one. We need explanations. The cliffhanger that Portal 2 ended on is just perfect, and made everyone want more.
A+ COOP
I would be disappointed if steam doesn't release portal 3.
